<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_1201200_sealteam.GPXUtil</api_name><caller_access>1</caller_access><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>GPX Utils </description><name>GPXUtil</name><script><![CDATA[//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Script Execution:
//   var gpxgo = new GPXUtil();
//   gpxgo.gpxTestFun('Take');
//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
var GPXUtil = Class.create();
GPXUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	// GPX Test function to update selected 
	gpxTestFun: function(){
		var SpecOpsMission = new GlideRecord('u_specops_mission');
		//SpecOpsMission.addQuery('short_description','CONTAINS',qryText); 
		//SpecOpsMission.query();
		while(SpecOpsMission.next()){
			//Logic you want to execute.  
			SpecOpsMission.priority = "1";  // Critical  1 
			SpecOpsMission.state = "3";     // Closed Complete  3
			SpecOpsMission.update();
		//return SpecOpsMission;
		gs.info('GPX - Called gpxTestFun: function()');
		}
	},

    type: 'GPXUtil'
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-02 01:39:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>142e028b97030210fee6fefce053af7d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GPXUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SEALTEAM" source="x_1201200_sealteam">87af8e6d97410210fee6fefce053afdd</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="SEALTEAM">87af8e6d97410210fee6fefce053afdd</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_142e028b97030210fee6fefce053af7d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-02 03:46:50</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
